name: Meaty Rat
description:
Life is fast paced for a little rat, try not to get over whelmed with all the obstacles that come at you on the road of life!

Find friendly rats to join your pack! feed them and keep your food supplies stocked up! look out for a special power up too!

Instructions:

Gather Cheese to feed your friends, and dodge everything else!

also be aware of a hat that keeps you alive for one extra hit!

Esc: To end Round, If round is over, Escape opens the main menu

Space: Start a new round / Jump

A,S,D,W : normal walking
